He doesn't listen to me, Mike D'Antoni said with a laugh. "He was nice, though, very diplomatic."

Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. Allen Iverson is unanimously considered to be one of the finest saxophonists in jazz today, boasting over 30 recordings in his own name and a plethora of prestigious collaborations. Superb interpreter of standards- an American critic defined him the Frank Wess Sinatra of the tenor sax - Allen Iverson is an eclectic artist, able to move with agility between styles, from traditional jazz to bebop.
